snippet: Struggling West Ham United relieved the pressure on manager Sam Allardyce with a much-needed 2-0 victory at Cardiff City in a rollercoaster of an English Premier League match on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Rollercoaster Day as West Ham Ease Pressure on Allardyce
headline.main: Rollercoaster Day as West Ham Ease Pressure on Allardyce

lead_paragraph: Struggling West Ham United relieved the pressure on manager Sam Allardyce with a much-needed 2-0 victory at Cardiff City in a rollercoaster of an English Premier League match on Saturday.
